trans-unit.source: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
trans-unit.target: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

trans-unit.source: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.
trans-unit.target: She is the apex of the artificer's craft, the spirit of the divine called out of base metal.

trans-unit.source: Reminders of Memnarch's reign still skirr across Mirrodin, reminiscent of his form if not his power.
trans-unit.target: Reminders of Memnarch's reign still skirr across Mirrodin, reminiscent of his form if not his power.

trans-unit.source: "We sculpt the land into what we need—homes, armament, fortresses of war. Our strength comes not only from knowing, but from commanding the terrain."\n—Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha

trans-unit.target: Metalcraft — Ardent Recruit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

trans-unit.source: "We lost our homes and our kin. We won't let those rotters take our future as well."
trans-unit.target: "We lost our homes and our kin. We won't let those rotters take our future as well."

trans-unit.source: "An appropriately detailed model is indistinguishable from reality, and much easier to control."

trans-unit.source: Mephidross gives up treasure easily... as long as you take its place.

trans-unit.source: The myr are like quicksilver: malleable in function and adaptable in form.

trans-unit.source: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. {U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn. Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
trans-unit.target: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. {U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn. Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

trans-unit.source: Scholars say that arbiters exist on every world, created by an unknown hand to enforce justice.
